title: Wednesday Post Show (8-25-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (8-25-21)
description:
Bobby starts by talking about his ‘domesticated’ day yesterday. He also talks about how doctors are warning against the Milk Crate challenge. We also get a special gift from Sarabeth Taite and open it on the air. We also call Daniel from Tige and Daniel again to get an update on his idea he sent Bobby about a lie detector test. Plus a woman who is banned from a zoo because of her relationship with a chimp.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Plus a woman who is banned from a zoo because of her relationship with a chimp.
